Reviews.Title: Impressive for the price.
Reviews.Author: Golden
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase this at $299 after the glossy black oCOSMO 40 inch set was sold out.For $300 this TV is great:Light at less than 20 pounds.Decent picture, though color has some noticeable banding at times.Bright enough, even when mounted just below florescent lights in an office.3 HDMI ports, VGA/D-Sub port, Audio In, Coax, RCA Audio out, RCA Aaudio/Video in, and 1 set component inputs.Sounds pretty low quality.(Edit to add another feature) Viewing angle is stellar. No dimming or darkening, even when right next to the unit.For a basic TV this gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Rico Suave "carp"
Reviews.Content: The Roku ready adapter (sold seperately) is extremely fast, no lagging on the apps. I have the TV on my patio connected wirelessly and since it is roku I can use the slingplayer app to watch my directv on it without having to have another receiver out there. With all the extras you get on this tv for under $300 why would you look at anything else in this size range. Highly recommend

Reviews.Title: I love this thing!
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: I bought this because Smart TV with QAM version was sold out for a while.  I didn't really need either of those, but I thought the Smart TV ability might be something I want in the future.Anyway, I have no regrets choosing this one.  I'll use this primarily as a large monitor for my laptop.  I'm a photographer, so the quality and options in such a display are very important to me.  I was able to turn sharpening off, and there are saturation and tint options so I can get very close to correct colors.  I was very happy to see that, unlike almost all consumer displays, this TV did not have overly blue colors right out of the box.  The picture itself is nice and clear.  No dead pixels, completely uniform lighting and color.The remote is colorful and surprisingly light.  It has enough buttons/options to put almost everything you could want at your fingertips.Sound is lackluster, but I never planned on using the TV speakers.  I suggest you don't plan on that, either.  I have it hooked up to some powered speakers - not an A/V receiver.  If you plan to hook it up to an A/V receiver, use the L/R RCA Audio Out jacks.  Audio Out takes the control of the sound away from the TV/remote, because it assumes you'll control that through the receiver.  My powered speakers don't have their own remote, so instead I hooked them up via the headphones jack on the TV.  This way, I can control the audio levels with the remote and not have to get up and turn the knob on my speakers.All in all, highly recommended!  Haven't heard of oCOSMO and are anxious.  Please don't be.  This TV rocks.  What a steal.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for the Money
Reviews.Author: Mike B.
Reviews.Content: First off the TV came with everything, really everything, they even included a screw driver to attach the baseplate to the TV.Pros:Price!Easy to assemble.Decent hookups and ports available.Cons:Settings are limited.Speakers (but not terrible)Overall its a great value but there is obviously a quality difference in the panel used in this TV compared with my current Panasonic. Even after tuning and setup the same 1080p content looked slightly less sharp and refined on this compared to my Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Great for price!
Reviews.Author: Zachery T. Wilson "Zachery Wilson"
Reviews.Content: This tv is amazing for the price.  I never thought I would find a 40 inch tv that was full HD for $300.  Obviously, the sound isn't incredible, but you get what you pay for.  I would have bought a Samsung if I could afford it.  I would recommend adding a sound bar or surround sound for better sound quality.  I would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: O cosmo <:O)
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: This is a fabulous tv so far, for under 300 $  It has as good of an hd picture that one could expect on a tv in this price range. I hope it last me for many yrs. ahead.<:O)

Reviews.Title: WASTE OF MONEY!!! Read here
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV last month as a living room TV. I saw the great price and decent reviews online and decided to take a risk and purchase a TV that had mixed reviews... Boy do I regret it.It wasn't a few days before this TV had dead pixels forming before my eyes as I proceeded to tell myself it was a quality TV for the price. Next, the HDMI port proceeded to fail and cause the screen to be fuzzy, having to play around with the cord to get the picture back again. THIS TV IS LOW QUALITY. Sure, I expected sub-perfect quality, but I didn't expect a TV that is just absolutely un-watchable.Returning the TV was a nightmare and I don't wish it upon my worst enemy! I wish I would have just purchased a quality TV to begin with.After dealing with the return, I purchased a MUCH better TV for only $80 more. Trust me, $80 extra is worth the better quality TV and not having to deal with a bad quality TV and returning that bad TV.If you want a QUALITY 40 inch TV, check this one out -----> http://amzn.to/SCb3Qp it is here on Amazon. I currently own it now and have never been HAPPIER! It has a great quality picture and wasn't insanely expensive like some of the other TV's for sale here. Please, save yourself the time and frustration that I put myself through!

Reviews.Title: First opinion of replacement TV
Reviews.Author: James clanton
Reviews.Content: The 40 tv has a great picture but the replacement has a vibration in the sound when lower voices are speaking like a possible bad speaker .

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv! Very clear picture, good sound, and deep colors. There are tons of connections and the product is a good quality. Great deal for the money!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: David Anshus
Reviews.Content: If you never heard of oCosmo TV do not feel ignorant.  neither did I.  and there is almost nothing on the web about them either, and nobody I could look up had them listed.  But oCosmo TV is a great value as the TV I got in 2 days from Amazon is as good so far as the Panasonic I got last year for twice the price.  The instructions are a bit light, but are sufficient, and the web site  has a lot of room to grow, shall we say.  But  it is very good, works fine, has lots and lots of plumbing in the back so it can be configured as required, and it was very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Wish there was a 3 1/2 star
Reviews.Author: George Simpson
Reviews.Content: Easy set up. Picture is good but not great.  Would reccommend to any one except if you are very fussy about the picture clarity

Reviews.Title: Good product, good price
Reviews.Author: M. R. H.
Reviews.Content: It's not the biggest TV in the world, but it is an awesome value if you just need a good, functional TV

Reviews.Title: Great TV for this price range
Reviews.Author: sswlaw
Reviews.Content: This was the best tv I was able to find in the price range/quality ratio. You can tell it's not made of high quality materials but the screen itself is what matters and with that, I'm very satisfied. It seems to produce vibrant and clear images with decent audio (though I'm adding a soundbar to it). One thing to note, as another reviewer recently mentioned - someone seems to be stealing the materials inside, including the remote, user manual, and base connector (which includes a mini screwdriver). I too opened the box to find all that stuff missing so I called oCosmo and to my delight they overnight shipped all that was missing. Kind of a hassle to have to do that but it might actually be an issue with Amazon's warehouse. Oh well, I'm completely satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Showed up with no remote, manual or any accessories except the base.
Reviews.Author: Joel R
Reviews.Content: I hooked it up anyway, picture was good, but getting up to make any channel changes or input, volume etc without a remote was pointless.  Went back in the box back to amazon same day.This TV didn't even have the coax cable connection to hook it to my cable box.  It had a giant HOLE where what appears to be a place to put it.  Like someone stole the connecter out of the TV.  I know it doesn't have a decoder, but not even a connector?  Come'on!I bought the same "brand" from the worlds biggest retailer chain (you get the point) with the decoder and a cable connection for $290.it however did NOT have the optical audio output...

Reviews.Title: would not turn on
Reviews.Author: angela dozack
Reviews.Content: Enough said. The tv would not even turn on. Not a quality product by any means. Do not waste your time
